preqs: Associate Dean (Education) approval required.Prerequisite Knowledge: Research methods and a sound understanding of the research topic area.

rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {CPE4000, CSE4000, GCO4000, IMS4000}

proh: Students are not permitted to enrol in this unit more than once.
description: FIT5000 is an extension unit for all FIT coursework masters minor thesis degrees, where appropriate. Entry only available on approval by the Associate Dean (Education) where exceptional circumstances have been determined.
